CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(StatusCategory, "None") , ISPICKVAL(StatusCategory, "Scheduled"), ISPICKVAL(StatusCategory, "Dispatched") , ISPICKVAL(StatusCategory, "In Progress")), NOT( ISNULL( GDMFSL_Service_Contract__c))) , GDMFSL_Service_Contract__r.GDMFSL_SC_Block__c, false)
CustomField.label: SC Block
